example.eg: Gotcha! Now you come here and finish eating your vegetables!
example.egtrans: 抓到你了！现在快过来把菜吃完！

example.eg: Gotcha! Looks like I win again!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我打败你了, 你输了

example.eg: Okay, gotcha; I'll get started on that right away.
example.egtrans: 好的，明白了。我马上就去办。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我懂你的意思了, 明白了
